analysis: The project currently lacks a cohesive black hole theme with animated elements. The existing files have incomplete content and need updates to reflect a cosmic, dark theme with black hole visuals and animations. The HTML structure is incomplete, the CSS lacks the necessary styles for the theme, and the JavaScript needs to be updated to handle animations and interactions.

improvements.description: Complete the HTML content to include sections for black hole information, interactive planets, and animated slides. Add a mobile-friendly navigation menu with a hamburger icon.
Update the CSS file to include a dark, cosmic theme with animations for black hole visuals, swirling effects, and glowing elements. Ensure the styles are cohesive and enhance the user experience.
Update the JavaScript file to handle animations and interactions for the black hole theme. Ensure all buttons have proper event handlers and functionality, including the mobile menu toggle.
